column4: sweet, my, now former, windows using freind just sat at this laptop and was like "I WANT THIS!"
i wish i could run the full desktop on this machine
i cant wait to get this wireless
everytime i move it it locks my system for some reason
ok i have an fstab question.  if i put in a share, and its not available, it will just ignore it, correct?
maybe your eth0 card comes loose when you move the cable.
yeah probably comes loose. That happend once when my audio card came loose.
you gotta edit your config files.
That should do it for you.
so if you change it that will write over it?
use the 'locate' command to find the global config.
try backing that up something like 'mv menu-xdg menu-xdg.bak'
